game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.#text:
Objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact
Description: In a land ravaged by war, rumors of a powerful artifact have begun to spread. The artifact is said to possess unimaginable power and whoever wields it can change the course of history. You have been tasked with finding and retrieving this artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.
 reward:Ancient Knowledge and 1000 gold coins
KeyCompleteness: The key 'quest_giver' is missing
